snippet.title: Mulle Meck bygger bilar speedrun Any% 02:57 (old WR)
snippet.description:
My first real attempt at trying to speedrun a game.
I haven't perfected it yet but as it's short so it shouldn't be that hard to find the time. If my computer can still run this that is.

This has been the world record as no one else had submitted a speedrun of the game when I posted it. Someone took the start I figured out and made a faster run of it though.

This speedrun uses the (intentional?) glitch that when the car runs dry you open the diploma page and get a whole new car with infinite power. If I do any more speedruns on this game I will speedrun without this glitch to make it more interesting.

The other thing this speedrun uses is the dialouge skip. By tabing out the game and then refocusing the game thinks the dialouge is done and skips it.

Please like and subscribe if you want more of this.
(It might encourage me a lot if I get some likes)
